interface.name: ClassObjectReference
interface.javadoc:
An instance of java.lang.Class from the target VM. Use this interface to access type information for the class, array, or interface that this object reflects.
ReferenceType
Gordon Hirsch
1.3

Returns the {@link ReferenceType} corresponding to this class object. The returned type can be used to obtain detailed information about the class.
the {@link ReferenceType} reflected by this class object.
